title: Optimization workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of an optimization record.

The optimization workflow relies on business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field affected by a business rule during that phase. For more information about the default business rules defined for the optimization workflow, see Optimization process - Business rules.

Metaphase: Creation

The optimization record is created.

Phase Transition Description
Create Manual

This is the starting point for the basic optimization workflow. The optimization record is in this phase after being created.

Move the optimization record to the Send survey phase when the application analyst is ready to send a survey.

Next phase: Send survey

Metaphase: Preparation

A survey is sent to the application owners and responses are collected.

Phase Transition Description
Send survey Automatic

The survey is sent to the application owners.

  • The record is automatically transitioned to the Wait for response phase when the survey is sent successfully.
  • The record is automatically transitioned to the Resend survey phase when the survey is failed to send to the application owners.

Next phase: Wait for response or Resend survey
Wait for response Manual

Survey responses are collected from the application owners.

Transition the record to the Assess phase when the application owners complete the survey.

Next phase: Assess
Resend survey Manual

The record is automatically moved to the Resend survey phase if the survey is failed to send to the application owners.

Transition the record to the Send survey phase to try sending the survey again.

Next phase: Send Survey

Metaphase: Assessment

Data is assessed through an algorithm.

Phase Transition Description
Assess Manual

Data begins to be assessed after the application analyst moves the record to this phase.

  • Transition the record to the Wait for response phase if the assessment is failed and the application analyst wants to try again.
  • Transition the record to the Complete phase when the optimization report is viewed and the application analyst wants to create a proposal from this record.

Next phase: Wait for response or Complete

Metaphase: Done (End)

The optimization is complete or abandoned.

Phase Transition Description
Complete None

The optimization is complete. A proposal record can be created from this optimization record.

Next phase: None

Related topics

  • Optimizations
  • How to create an optimization record
  • How to edit an optimization record
  • How to create a proposal from an optimization record
  • How to optimize applications
